articles.title: Coronavirus: What's happening in Canada and around the world on Sunday - CBC.ca
articles.description: The Canada emergency response benefit (CERB) expires on Sunday, ending the income support program the federal government rolled out during the COVID-19 pandemic to help people with payouts of up to $2,000 a month.
articles.content:
The latest:
  • CERB ending, replaced with revamped EI program to counter pandemic job losses.
  • Toronto closes 3 restaurants to protect the public from COVID-19.
